seo.title: Kling 3 Standard – Multi-shot Text & Image to Video | MaxVideoAI
seo.description: Create multi-shot Kling 3 Standard clips with scene prompts, elements, and optional voice control. 3–15s, 1080p, with native audio.

overview: Kling 3 Standard delivers scene-level prompting, elements, and optional voice control at a lower price point. Generate 3–15s clips from text or image inputs with native audio and flexible aspect ratios.
pricingNotes: Pricing is per second: $0.252/s with audio, $0.168/s audio off, $0.308/s with voice control.

hero.title: Kling 3 Standard – Multi-shot storytelling at lower cost
hero.intro: Scene prompts, elements, and audio in a more cost-effective tier.

technicalOverview.label: Inputs
technicalOverview.body: Text → Video; Image → Video (PNG/JPG/WebP), optional end frame

technicalOverview.label: Controls
technicalOverview.body: Multi-prompt scenes, elements, shot type, voice IDs

technicalOverview.label: Audio
technicalOverview.body: Native audio on by default; toggle off or enable voice control

promptStructure.title: Prompting Kling 3 Standard
promptStructure.quote: Scene 1: [shot]. Scene 2: [shot]. Scene 3: [shot]. Set a duration for each scene.
promptStructure.description: Break a clip into scenes, then anchor continuity with elements and an end frame.
steps: Decide on audio or voice IDs
